skins.shipDescription: Cleveland-class light cruiser ®C Montpelier, hull number CL-57.
skins.selfIntroduction: Listen, the Cleveland-class were the most powerful cruisers the Eagle Union had in the war. You should show more respect for my big sis. ... Me? I was in the battles of Midway, Augusta Bay, and a few others. I guess I did okay.
skins.acquisition: You're a commander? You don't... look reliable. But my big sis works for you... I've no choice, then. Montpelier, reporting for duty. I don't really care whether you give me orders or not.
skins.login: So, you're back. I'll take my leave, then. It's too crowded in here for me.
skins.details: Big sis! ... Oh, it's you. Need something?
skins.secretaryIdle1: How can I be more like Cleveland... "Smile"? ... That might not be possible...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I don't get along with anyone but my sisters. As for you, Commander... I'll try.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I'm curious: when my sister's doing secretary work, what's she like?
skins.secretaryTouch: ... Huh? If you've no need of me, don't call for me.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: G-gotta put up with it... This is obviously a test of the trust I have for my big sis...!

skins.shipDescription: So this is Sakura-style New Year's attire... If Cleve was also interested in this... Hm? Commander, were you watching? Um, well, Happy New Year's.
skins.acquisition: So this is Sakura-style New Year's attire... If Cleve was also interested in this... Hm? Commander, were you watching? Um, well, Happy New Year's.
skins.details: The Sakura Empire's New Year's celebration is... a bit different from my expectations.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The sleeves on this outfit are long and heavy... and this, uh... dress? It's really hard to move around in. Don't they find this cumbersome?
skins.secretaryIdle2: If Cleve was to wear this outfit... Hmm, I can't picture it after all.
skins.secretaryIdle3: My New Year's wish...? I'd like to get a bit closer with Cleve, I suppose...
skins.secretaryTouch: ...You'd like to see me dance in this outfit? Commander, you're as prone to flights of fancy as always.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Everyone is hard at work preparing for New Year's... but what in the world is going on inside that head of yours?
